name: Space Displacer
description: This module upgrades landmines to autonomous Inner Land Mines that actively position themselves around the tower for optimal defense coverage.

calculation_formulas.damage_multiplier: Uses lv1 x30 damage multiplier if ultimate weapon not unlocked, otherwise uses ILM stats

context_fields.when_to_use: When using landmine systems and need enhanced defensive coverage
context_fields.priority_level: High - autonomous mines provide better defensive positioning
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Focus on higher rarity versions for better spawn chances
synergy_combinations: Inner Land Mine ultimate weapon for enhanced effectiveness
Land mine damage research for increased damage
Other defensive modules for comprehensive builds
counter_strategies: Higher spawn chance with better rarity
Combines well with ILM ultimate weapon
context_fields.resource_efficiency: High - autonomous mines provide better defensive positioning

notes: Space displacer uses the lv1 x30 damage multiplier if the ultimate weapon is not unlocked
If you do have the ILM unlocked, the stats and effects of your ILM will be used
This means sub effects such as +ILM damage multiplier will affect total damage
unique_effect: Landmines have a [x]% chance to spawn as an Inner Land Mine (20 max) instead of a normal mine. These mines autonomously move and organize around the tower.
